metadata.title: CVE-2020-8189 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: A cross-site scripting error in Nextcloud Desktop client 2.6.4 allowed to present any html (including local links) when responding with invalid data on the login attempt.

criterions.comment: nextcloud-desktop package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.1-3').
